answer: American Airlines have the highest number of airlines with a count of 2171. They also have very little total costs when compared with other airline operators. Speed IAS in knots is low for Taxi, Take off run, parked and landing roll phases and is higher for other phases of the flight. Most of the flights are booked from July to October and most of those flights are night time or day time flights. The origin state of a lot of the flights is in Texas and most of these flights are day time flights.
